attributes.action: Sack every MP and stop them re-running for office ever again.
attributes.additional_details: Yes it would be messy but we need a different way of thinking. At worse it would be interesting to hear the MP's debating sacking themselves in parliament. In fact that's actually the best case as let's face it they aren't going to sack themselves but it would be nice to hear them justify themselves in public
attributes.background: With everything that's been going on the British political system is a shambles and needs a shake up. The idea of a fresh start is what's needed by banning anyone who has previously stood as a member of parliament from holding a government position and starting from scratch

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. That includes asking for people to resign or be sacked. 

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could search for and sign a petition about that:

https://petition.parliament.uk/

If you would like a general election, you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480 

You might also like to consider signing this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/249457
